casebody.data:
No. D-2533. In the Matter of Discipline of Richard Paul Condon. 562 U.S. 813, 131 S. Ct. 404,

178 L. Ed. 2d 268,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7640. October 4, 2010.

Richard Paul Con-don, of Kissimmee, Florida, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 *269days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
